scripts.release:patch: cd packages/sdk && npm version patch && cd ../.. && git add . && git commit -m 'chore: release sdk patch version' && git tag v$(node -p 'require("./packages/sdk/package.json").version')
scripts.release:minor: cd packages/sdk && npm version minor && cd ../.. && git add . && git commit -m 'chore: release sdk minor version' && git tag v$(node -p 'require("./packages/sdk/package.json").version')
scripts.release:major: cd packages/sdk && npm version major && cd ../.. && git add . && git commit -m 'chore: release sdk major version' && git tag v$(node -p 'require("./packages/sdk/package.json").version')
scripts.publish:sdk: git push origin main && git push --tags
